reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The room was very clean and maid service excellent. Although we visited Hua Hin a few times
reviews.title: Ideal for a weekend break but not your annual holiday!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is our third visit to this hotel during last two years, during first two hotel was under Holiday inn Management. The location is still great for holiday, breakfast at same quality, same staff, rooms still need face lift. However, this time check in/out was slower, as new staff is being trained.
reviews.title: What has changed?

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It seems that new Management is considering some changes, and hopefully they will sort out the internet issue that is presently too expensive. If i decide to go back to Cha Am, then certainly I will stay at this hotel
reviews.title: Fantastic Holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel was as good as it looks on its website. Right on the beach, with lovely pools, grounds and rooms. Very friendly staff. Local fishing village is a 5 minute walk away with some lovely restaurants and bars -also a range of bars along the beach -that are cheap and offer a good massage for your aching bones!
reviews.title: A very relaxing week

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: We stayed here for a week in a superior room which had a partial View of the sea and the sunrise.
reviews.title: Excellent as ever

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: We were a little bit wary as we had read the more negative reviews and our travel agent had warned us of work being done so wasn't sure what to expect. Our first room did have a problem with a leak from the room above and it smelled damp but as soon as I mentioned it to reception we were immediately moved to another room.
reviews.title: Amazing stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The property located in very nice beach, calm and feel more relaxing. The room is really clean with modern design. in the morning, various food items and well served from staff team. usually I do like medium size property because want to have prompt service. but we can also find prompt service at The Regent Cha Am Beach Resort.
reviews.title: Nice Room and friendly service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is very very nice but needs a lick of paint here and there. However the pool and gardens are immaculate. We found the rooms to be large and comfortable, very clean. We particularly liked the bed pillows because you had a choice of soft or hard. If you can afford the upgrade go form the regency wing. The hotel is nicely situated near to a little village which has bars restaurants shops laundry and more or less everything that you need. There is a very good beach although the sand in front of the hotel has eroded away and therefore steps have been provided to gain access. The new management seemed very keen to listen to their guests and from what we understand improvements will be made during the quiet season. The hotel has many returning guests which will include us as we have already booked for next year. The only complaint that we had was trying to find a sun bed without towels on them and found that bribing the pool boys was the solution.
reviews.title: A very pleasant stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent one night in a 'beach villa'. Not really what you expect of a beach villa. We had no view on the beach but un the airconditioning of the other cottage. But the prices are not high.
reviews.title: Needs renovation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent the day at the second pool near the Regent wing where it was quiet and not many guests.
reviews.title: home from home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is very big and gives cheaper accolodations to many international touroperator. Not the romantic escape.
reviews.title: The perfect place to crash and relax

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: On wanting to get away with some friends of the holiday weekend at short notice we had problems finding somewhere to stay, we eventually stumbled on the Regent which hasnt long been taken back from the Holiday Inn back to Regent! We stayed here on our very 1st asian trip 17 years ago and it appears that not much has been done to the property in the last 17 years!
reviews.title: You get what you pay for

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thailand is known as the land of smiles and rightly so as usually Thai people are so gracious and always pleasant.. it seems that this has not been relayed to most of the staff at the Regent, service with a smile has certainly not reached this hotel.... There were a couple of staff who were attentive and smiled but on the whole i would say that the ratio was not great!
reviews.title: Needs Work

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pool guy threw the towels at me on both mornings when i went to get pool towels .. not really something you expect!
reviews.title: Great holiday!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: The serving staff were not much better, My friend ordered a meal at Sakuna (thai restaurant) for her 10 year old daughter and after waiting 40 minutes we asked when the food would arrive, as we had all eaten.. the waitress then said "Oh very big sorry, chef said no longer available" mmm would have been nice had she told us that the chef said not available!!! we then had to wait another 25 minutes for a club sandwich as a replacement.
reviews.title: Family Holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: Ordered coffee at the beach restaurant and after 40 minutes went to ask where it was only to be told "Oh sorry i forgot"!!!!! Now dont get me wrong i admit sometimes things go wrong but this hotel seems to have a whole catalogue of errors
reviews.title: gr8 resort! bit old...

aka: Holiday Inn Resort Regent Beach Cha-Am Hotel Cha-Am
description: The Regent Cha Am Beach Resort embraces an enchanting stretch of unspoiled beach along the sunrise side of the Gulf of Thailand. The resort naturally blends with its lush tropical garden surroundings. The rooms are accessed by airy, open corridors with soothing views of the vast park’s greenery or the twinkling blue sea.
